QuestData.Title: Slumberbloom
QuestData.Description: Huh?... Oh my, I appear to have fallen asleep again.$b$bThese slumberblooms are nothing but trouble. One second I'm fighting botani and the next I'm dreaming I'm an elekk dancing with riverbeasts.$b$b*Yawn* We really should do something about all these slumberbloo *Yawn* ... ZZZZzzzzzzzz$b$b<You gather a small handful of pebbles laying by the sleeping draenei.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Gathered Pebbles to pop the Slumberblooms.
QuestData.RewardText: You can sleep easy tonight knowing you have destroyed so many slumberblooms... just not quite as easy.
